item.title: Overflowing bins and cleanliness, 16th July
item.description:
Issue at- 121 Redwald Road E5 0JQ The property has had overflowing bins, littering and cleanliness issues for over a year now. As show in the pictures they have over flowing bins all the time which is attracting loads of pests and flies.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Redwald Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Car abandoned, 16th July
item.description:
Car has been in this spot with two flat tyres for many months. At least 3 maybe 6 months now. Located in a parking space on Hatton court off Gilpin Road behind Ashbourne court block of flats.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gilpin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Commercial bbq by non residents on our block!!!, 16th July
item.description:
In a garden on our block there's regularly non residents setting open fire in barrels for what looks like commercial amount of meat causing massive smoke and smell. The grilling often lasts 6+ hours well into the night accompanied by loud noise!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wick Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Teenager's with Catapults, 16th July
item.description:
In Grassmead Park on a number of occasions around 19.30 to 20.30, there have been a number of Teenagers with catapult try to kill birds. I walk my dog in the park and am concerned that they might try and hit my dog. A number of dog walkers have noticed this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanton Close, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous paving slabs, 16th July
item.description:
2 really bad slabs here that rock when you standon them. A lady on her way to the tube station went flying when she tripped this morning. She said she was okay but it was a nasty fall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4,2, Durnsford Road, London
